LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_BS.title: <color=#87b4ff>Ice-World Child</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_BS.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a planet covered in ice. This special ecological environment is very similar to the native land of the Ferian's tribe, for them, this is the most warm place. \n\nThe perfect material life, the incredible morals that make this world incredible.[PAWN_nameDef] have been receiving the pure culture, until master all the knowledge in the "book".
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_DS.title: <color=#87b4ff>City-World Child</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_DS.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a planet covered in city. The elegant art of soaring into the stratosphere is interspersed with green vegetation from every corner of their galaxy. Several giant ecological reserves provide a perfect distraction for Ferians who tired of silver and gold. \n\nThe perfect material life, the incredible morals that make this world incredible.[PAWN_nameDef] have been receiving the pure culture, until master all the knowledge in the "book".
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_XH.title: <color=#87b4ff>Ring-World Child</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_XH.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on one of the great ring-world. Four rings crisscross around a Beautiful Blue Star. These wonders will provide the most comfortable life for hundreds of millions of Ferians in the centuries to come. \n\nThe perfect material life, the incredible morals that make this world incredible.[PAWN_nameDef] have been receiving the pure culture, until master all the knowledge in the "book".
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_FX.title: <color=#87b4ff>Storm-World Child</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_FX.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a gas giant. The planet's atmosphere has been stabilized, its moons transformed into vast ecological parks, and the myriad giant Yuncheng District reflecting the sky's dazzling Auroras are every moment of poetic beauty. \n\nThe perfect material life, the incredible morals that make this world incredible.[PAWN_nameDef] have been receiving the pure culture, until master all the knowledge in the "book".
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_HA.title: <color=#87b4ff>Dark-World Child</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_HA.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a giant space station. Wrapped in a black hole, this massive structure holds an inexhaustible supply of energy. Ferians live in the space station outside the surface, raise the head is the vast starry sky, that is our hometown! \n\nThe perfect material life, the incredible morals that make this world incredible.[PAWN_nameDef] have been receiving the pure culture, until master all the knowledge in the "book".
